Contributors
############

MolMod is developed and maintained by `Toon Verstraelen
<Toon.Verstraelen@UGent.be>`_ at the `Center for Molecular Modeling
<http://molmod.ugent.be/>`_.

Molmod also contains contributions from:

* Louis Vanduyfhuys
* Wouter Smet
* An Ghysels
* Steven Vandenbrande
* Ondrej Marsalek
